title: Tom Pidcock is the Ultimate Tour de France Wild Card: ‘We Will Keep Him in the GC’
content:
Ineos Grenadiers is committed to protecting Carlos Rodríguez and Egan Bernal across this Tour de France, but Pidcock could play a decisive GC 'joker' role.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock is the Ultimate Tour de France Wild Card: ‘We Will Keep Him in the GC’ on Velo.
author: ahood
